com.pos.device.emv

Interface IEMVCallback.ApduExchangeListener

  • Enclosing interface:
    IEMVCallback

    public static interface IEMVCallback.ApduExchangeListener
    APDU Exchange callback interface

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int apduExchange(byte[] sendData, int[] recvLen, byte[] recvData)
      To exchange APDU command between IC card reader and IC card.

    • Method Detail

      • apduExchange

        int apduExchange(byte[] sendData,
               int[] recvLen,
               byte[] recvData)
        To exchange APDU command between IC card reader and IC card.
        Parameters:
        sendData - The data that sent from EMV core.
        recvLen - The data length that sent from EMV core, recvLen[0] represents the really length of sendData array.
        recvData - The data that received from application.the EMV core will accept the data.
        Returns:
        To tell the EMV core success if returns 0 else failure .
